Text: Could you upload the complete season 2 in 1080p without watermark please

i COULD

but not going to upload 30 gb just for you.

if i get a bunch of requests, then sure. but you're the first, so no.
Well, would you consider uploading an episode each week if there's not too much request? (if it's not too much trouble.)
Yeah I want an 1080p season 1 & 2 no watermar version to of the clone wars plz upload
nes7day & lievenazerty I can seed 720p ones with no watermark but i don't have 1080p ones

The best that is currently out is 720p.
Hmmm I don't get it, is 720p w/5.1 sound unbearable? or am I just missing the point or something?

the point is the request is to upload in 1080p.

there is a MAJOR difference that can be noticed by most people. but the point is, it's not 1080p as requested.
Well, I would prefer 1080p, but if there's non available, 720p would just be splendid. As long as there is no watermark on them.

well my seedbox is ending tomorrow. So unless i find some money i can use to pay for a new month, i'm not gonna be uploading any 720p stuff.

they are getting harder and harder to find now both 720p and 1080p
